name: pharaoh-tools
description: Pharaoh Tools build to publish assets

scripts.build: npm run build:fs && (browserify app --standalone=pharaohTrack | uglifyjs --mangle > ../../../PostInput/Assets/Modules/DefaultSkin/js/bundle.js) && cp ../../../PostInput/Assets/Modules/DefaultSkin/js/bundle.js ../../../DefaultSkin/Assets/js/bundle.js

author: asmblah
